name: Cold shower
description: Inspired by Juraj podcast https://juraj.bednar.io/podcast/2016/12/14/miso-duchon-o-cestovani-otuzovani-lifestyle-design-a-sebarozvoji/. It is great motivation tool (how I can do bigger things when I'm scared even just cold water? With adoption helped the fact that in Spring my shower broke and hot water stop working completely .)

name: Emacs
description: Push brain to learn new tool and also step towards learn more lisp or clojure in future. One nice benefit of learning and using Emacs is that many commands in terminal adhere many keyboard its shortcuts which also improve productivity in terminal.

name: Ethereum
description: Bitcoin future replecement ? Not having enough experience with btc and time in general it is on hold but it should be something to keep eye on for sure.

name: Zero TV series
description: My time is more valuable. Investing time to reading, listening music, safaribooks videos, tsume-go and sleep.

name: Reduce intake of Sugar
description: Good physical and psychical benefits. Haven't figured out how to reduce close to 100% and still have high intake of fructose.

name: HD 600 headphones
description: After long time decided go for open-back audiophile level type headphones. After research the HD 600 came as the best quality, features and price. Highly recommend!

name: AMP/DAC
description: Good headphones require also good AMP. Though haven't decided yet which.   Project Polaris by Garage1217 http://www.garage1217.com/garage1217_diy_tube_headphone_amplifiers_015.htm  Conductor V2+ by Burson https://www.bursonaudio.com/products/conductor-v2-plus/

name: New smartphone
description: Waiting for next year models. With latest iphone and google pixel 2 phones it is expectable that some of the features go to mainstream next year and also prices will drop. For now the current phone should serve good enough.

name: Bone
description: Bone comic book series, written and illustrated by Jeff Smith (1991 to 2004). Reading 2-3 issues per weekend and it is great fun.

name: E-reader
